about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with over 3 years of experience, specialized in Java, React, Node.js + Express. My journey began in 2017, and since then, I have been focusing on delivering high-quality software solutions. I am always looking for challenges that allow me to improve my skills and contribute to innovations.

gente.text: In my job, I participated in the migration of legacy platforms to new technologies, ensuring a quick transition. I performed continuous maintenance of systems, addressing bugs and improvements. I developed new features in the frontend and backend, and managed databases to efficiently manage information.

cwi.text: In my job, I managed the migration of legacy platforms, maintained and improved existing systems, and developed new features in the frontend and backend. I worked with databases to optimize performance and used agile methodologies such as Scrum. I also implemented and managed batch processes using JavaBatch platforms.
